page.title: 11PUBLIC SERVICES IN WESTON
page.content: In Weston we rely on the{fire}and {police}services from Baldock and {ambulances}from the Lister Hospital in Stevenage. We also have a{village shop and{post office.}There is{electricity but{no gas}although some homes have calor gas and there is a main gas pipeline within half a mile of Weston. We also have a{sewage works}at Halls Green, a small hamlet two miles from Weston. The national{bus service}runs on Tuesdays and Saturdays and is supplemented by an occassional coach service. We have a{taxi service}taking children to different schools.There is also a service taking children to Halls Green and to their homes. We have two{phone boxes}and four{post {boxes.}There is a post box by The Anchor, at Friends Green,the Post Office, in Weston, at Halls Green and Lannock.
